name: Upgraded Grasshopper
description: The Grasshopper is the original green monster drink, but this sweet and creamy dessert cocktail is reawakened with fresh mint.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup picked and washed mint leaves
1/2 ounce creme de cacao, such as Tempus Fugit
2 dashes mint bitters, such as Fee Bros.

recipeInstructions.text: For the Mint Cream: Combine mint and half and half in a sealed container. Transfer to refrigerator and allow to infuse for 2 days. Strain through a fine mesh strainer and discard mint.

For the Cocktail: Combine mint cream, cognac, rum, creme de cacao, mint bitters, and chocolate bitters in a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice, shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Garnish with 2 sprigs of mint.
